sections.title: Staves General Rules and Mechanics
sections.description: Complete rules for staves including physical description, activation, usage, recharging, caster level requirements, and how they interact with wielder abilities

sections.title: Staff Random Generation Tables
sections.description: Random treasure tables for generating staves by rarity tier (Lesser Medium, Greater Medium, Lesser Major, Greater Major) with prices and sources

sections.title: Paizo Staves Index
sections.description: Complete alphabetical index of all official Paizo staves with links to individual descriptions

sections.title: 3rd Party Publisher Staves Index
sections.description: Index and link to staves from third-party publishers outside of Paizo sources
